name: Cabin Fever (JonL13)
description:
You've been bitten by a zombie on the way to your friend's cabin - can you stay in control of yourself as the zombies attack?

This game was created within 48 hours using Love2D for GMTK Game Jam 2020  themed "Out of Control". As you play, you will periodically lose control of your character to "zombie fever", all while trying to defend a cabin from a growing horde of zombies. 

A game by Two Jons.
Original music and sound effects by Jon Bran.
Code from Jon Lamont.

Tilesheet from Asset Bakery: https://assetbakery.itch.io/horror-house-tileset
Title Image from ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/mountain-dusk-parallax-background
